metadata.title: CVE-2015-5186 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
Audit before 2.4.4 in Linux does not sanitize escape characters infilenames.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5186` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audispd-plugins - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
auditd - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
libaudit-common - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
libaudit1 - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
libauparse0 - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
python-audit - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
python3-audit - 1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audit package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.4.5-1ubuntu2').
